name: 360 Chicken
summary: A Guts'n'Glory styled Skateboarding game... Still in early development!

name: 36 Zodiac Cycles
summary: 36 Zodiacs Cycles is an unceasing journey of challenges. Trials across Human-Earth-Heaven 3 Tiers, 12 types of Zodiac Games, nearly 30 utterly distinct game challenges. Only by unraveling the Cycle's secrets can shatter this Cycle. Do you choose escape or confront the challenge?

name: 360 Five Nights at Freddy's
summary: 360FNAF is an accurate FNaF 1 Custom Night remade with modern technology. Play on your desktop in flat mode or in VR!

name: 360: Three Sixty
summary:
RACING and SHOOT-EM UP ACTION in a world submerged beneath oceans of water. Mount your hoverbike and lay waste to your opponents with lethal weapons and a revolutionary firing system. Use everything you have to speed, dodge, and blast your way to the ultimate goal - survival.
360... Survival balances on a knife edge.

If you think you are smart then this is a place where you can challenge the power of your mind. In this game you can use boxes and ladders to climb and find solutions to puzzles by focusing and thinking.

name: 36 Fragments of Midnight
summary: In this procedurally generated platform game, you have to collect all the Star Fragments of Midnight's friends to get of their greatest gift.

A match3 game with unique gameplay, beautiful background and many hidden achievement wait for you to discover.
You will diving deep into the ocean through the game to discover the ocean and sea creatures.

name: 36 Days a Week
summary:
A collection of 36 non linear poems.

A multidimensional prison cube left abandoned and unfinished.

6 Living Beings.

1 "ending"

name: 360 Mega Pack HD Remix
summary: A collection of titles such as Super Button Mashing Bros, Ultra Clock, TwinStick Shooter, Omega Calculator, Masters of Memory, Rumble Lounge, Arrow Panic, Fortuitous Fortune Cookie, Fantastic Flashlight, Ping, and Gravity Dash.

name: 360Hexaworld
summary: Another world 360Hexaworld is a Web 3.0 metaverse world platform

name: 36 Nights
summary: 36 Nights is a tower defense game with roguelike and bullet heaven elements. Buy turrets and upgrade your survivor to defend against waves of zombies. You'll need careful strategy and a little luck if you want to survive 36 nights...

name: 360 No Scope!
summary: 360 No Scope is a fast pace shooter that requires skill and accuracy. Take the fun and chaos of insta-gib with the only way to get ammo is by doing a 360, plus ability to run on walls, ceilings, and you get a fun chaos deathmatch experience.

name: 36 Apples
summary: Collect apples and uncover the secrets of a self-contained world.

name: 360 Mega App Pack HD
summary: 360 Mega App Pack HD is an Xbox Live Indie Game. It contains a collection of applications (such as Ultra Clock and Omega Calculator) and games (such as Super Button Mashing Bros and Arrow Panic), including two orginal tracks by independent music artist Nathan Gallup.

name: 365 Birthdays
summary: An interactable story starring articulate Dot Coppersimmons and the mysterious events that partake on her 21st birthday; including the accompaniment of the Birthday God himself.

name: 360 Breakout
summary: 360 Breakout allows players to maneuver the paddle all the way across the field and in 360 degrees.

name: 365 Days
summary: To survive in the wilderness always seems to be something dangerous and scary. But in this game you'll stay alone with nature, which does not want to kill you. Wild animals are aggressive here, but they just defend their territory and themselves, and they never attack first. Animals will study you and your habits. Will you live in harmony with nature or will you kill it - depends only on you.

name: 360 No Scope Arena
summary: 360 No Scope Arena is an online multiplayer shooter with a twist: you have to spin around before you can shoot your gun. Every kill is a "360 No Scope" in this arena. Every shot is a trick shot. This game rewards pure aiming skill above all else.
